channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 3 ways to make sure the ‘great wealth transfer’ enriches your family
item.description: From ‘affluenza’ to abundance: How to teach heirs to value their privilege — and your money

item.title: Teaching the model: Designing LLM feedback loops that get smarter over time
item.description: How to close the loop between user behavior and LLM performance, and why human-in-the-loop systems are still essential in the age of gen AI.

item.title: Elephant Robotics builds myCobot Pro 450 to meet industrial expectations
item.description: The myCobot Pro 450 is also compatible with a wide range of Large Language Models (LLMs), including DeepSeek, ChatGPT. The post Elephant Robotics buil...

item.title: An obsession with avoiding the estate tax cost this top exec his marriage. Now his son is speaking out.
item.description: The documentary “Death & Taxes” delves into Harvey Schein’s obsession with avoiding the IRS

item.title: ​Trump has perfected a tax on corporate America — just don’t call it a tax. Here’s how it could affect stocks.
item.description: The art of the steal: Trump’s Nvidia deal opens a ‘pay to play’ floodgate to do business. If you can’t afford the toll, don’t approach the booth.

item.title: Why your stock portfolio may actually ‘feel’ depressed that summer is almost over
item.description: Halloween merchandise and pumpkin-spice lattes in August are reminders that winter is coming.

item.title: University of Waterloo researchers develop robots to directly treat kidney stones

item.title: Most boomers and Gen X-ers are terrified about running out of money in retirement — even if they’re already retired
item.description: Anxiety has been peaking for people in and approaching retirement — how to manage it

item.title: Gartner: GPT-5 is here, but the infrastructure to support true agentic AI isn’t (yet)
item.description: While OpenAI’s GPT-5 is highly-performant, capable and an important step forward, it features just faint glimmers of true agentic AI.

item.description: For enterprise teams and commercial developers, this means the model can be embedded in products or fine-tuned.
